Oats (Avena sativa) are a whole-grain cereal mainly grown in North America and Europe. They are a very good source of fiber, especially beta glucan, and are high in vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants.

Orange or orange is a hybrid of citrus. It was created by crossing pomelo and mandarin. It is a small evergreen tree up to 10 meters high. The flowers are white, five-membered, and the fruit is hesperidium. Orange is a fruit of different citrus species from the Rutaceae family.

Grapes are a good source of potassium, a mineral that helps balance fluids in your body. Potassium can help bring down high blood pressure and lower your risk of heart disease and stroke. Most people don't get enough of this nutrient, so eating grapes can help fill the gap.
